page.title: 11My Street:High St.Hadleigh
page.content:
My street is called High Street. It is a very busy street with lots of shops and offices.My Dad owns an office and we live in a flat above it.We have a garden. The High St.is very long and when it rains very hard it floods the street. A lot of cars and lorries come down the street and a lot of Horses. On Sundays it is not very busy but the rest of the week it is. every time I'm in bed cars come rushing past and wake me up. I hate where we live. I hope we move soon.
(Jackie Potter - 8yrs)
